name: Defensive Network Security
description: Techniques for preventing cyber intrusions and securing sensitive systems.

cards.title: Threat Detection and Response
cards.description: Identifying and mitigating cyber threats in real-time.
cards.bulletpoints: Intrusion detection, SIEM analysis, forensic investigation

cards.title: Incident Response Planning
cards.description: Developing rapid response strategies for cyber incidents.
cards.bulletpoints: Containment strategies, threat intelligence sharing, rapid remediation
